    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Input()
      Input exists only to provide helper functions that involve input

        Returns:

      • Token

        public java.lang.String[] Token(java.lang.String temp)
        I decided to Tokenize my input by prompting the user to enter Tilda whenever they needed to separate inputs. Its a cheap way of doing it.
        Parameters:
        temp -
        Returns:
        String array from string split on Tilda
